cause.description:
It's time to stand up and no longer stand idly by as the Skanks of the world try to take the men of good women. The malicious and pathetic workings of the Skank need to be stopped... NOW! If you are a good girlfriend/boyfriend and have ever encountered the clevage-bearing, lip-pouting, eyelash-fluttering, utterly slutty ways of a skank who wont step off your partner, then you know that it is time to stand up against them! We may ask, "why is that bitch so skanky!?" or "why does she insist on slapping a post-it on everyone's crotch saying 'my property'?". Well the answer is simple: she is just a Skank. Prevention measures, such as the spray "Skank-Off" are in the works. So by joining our foundation and financially supporting us (haha) you can help eliminate the Skank!
1. Skanks are gross.
2. The end of the Skank must finally come.
3. If Skanks wont step off, they gonna get popped!
cause.name: The Pop-A-Skank Foundation
